text: Ok, so the whole simulation code actually works now, which is great.  I have to figure out a way to analyze the record I created, which is an array of arrays of integers representing the coordinates of the particle at every time step.

text: I wish there were an easy way to somehow figure out the lifetime of the particle based on these arrays.  I initialize the record of each reagent particle to [[x0, y0, z0], [1,1,1] ...] at the start of the simulation but wish I could somehow note when it’s destroyed.  The same goes for when the products are created, only I append a new record for each newly created product.
